name: The Epic Quest For The Migthy Jugs
name_original: The Epic Quest For The Migthy Jugs
description:
This game was made in 48h for the Wowie Jam 2.0
The theme was "Intentional Bugs"

Disclaimer

My interpretation of the theme is a silly character controller that seems familiar but is actually really buggy.

Welcome to the most epic quest to discover the mighty jugs. Your thirst for adventure puts you at the forefront of the greatest dangers. But beware of your strong tast for beverages. Last night's bender might makes the quest a lot harder. 

The game is quite doable in 5 to 10 minutes, there are no major hidden bugs to discover to finish it. In fact, I don't remember if there are any intentional bugs or if the character was drunk, or maybe it was me ...

If the game is stuck, there is a reset button in the top-right corner that respawn your character to the last checkpoint :)

There're a lot of things that were skipped in order to submit in time but I had many great ideas in stock. If you like the game and want it to be continue, let me know :)

Crédits 

Unity Assets used for this project :

  • Polygon Adevnture & Dungeon
  • Doozy UI
  • PuppetMaster
  • DotTween
  • Odin

Music : OverClocked ReMix - 1-01 L&D [Ganaé]

Code/Game Design/ Level Design : Arthur Scheidel
